#### Request for Proposal Information
The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide online, virtual facilitator-led ArcGIS training to participants across Western Canada and the Territories. The contractor must provide English-language training using the latest versions of ArcGIS Pro (3.1.0 and newer).

The training objectives are to expand the use of ArcGIS and GIS-based data analysis, provide advanced mapping capabilities, and enhance the ability to calculate spatial location and organize layers of information into visualizations using maps. This will enable Employment and Social Development Canada to strategically advance its regional efforts in the mapping field.

**Procurement Methods**

* Competitive - Open bidding ( procurement method )
* Request for Proposal ( notice type )

**Indigenous Business Requirements**

This procurement is conditionally set aside under the Canadian government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). When awarding a contract, if two (2) or more responsive bids meet the Indigenous Business Certification requirements, only those bids will be eligible for award. All other bids will also be eligible for award if no certified Indigenous businesses submit bids.
